recommended_degree: Teknik Pengelasan, Teknik Pengelasan Dan Fabrikasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in reviewing welding documents such as WPS, PQR, and Welder Qualification Records.
- Support the collection and organization of welding production data (WPR).
- Participate in observing welding activities in the workshop as part of technical development.
- Assist in evaluating welding requirements, consumables, and material specifications.
- Work closely with Welding Supervisors and Inspectors to prepare technical reports.
- International Welding Engineer Certificate (IWE)
